content: Well said! I love the way you’ve merged your ‘announcement’ into an interesting and thought provoking piece. Very skillfully woven with facts, and cultivated just enough data points to get me curious, whilst giving me your opinion and perspective on a topic that interests me. A great example of B2B content marketing if ever I saw a piece. Thanks for this both for the content of it, and the example of a great B2B content piece! :)
